p.s: A norwegianNorwegian newspaper sends three young fashion-blogger to cambodiaCambodia to get to know the work in a garment factory.
They talk with the people in Cambodia, visit a foodstuff market and a clothing market.
They slept in a house of a seamstress and share one matress with her.
All three of them are confronted with the work conditions they have to deal with.
After the experiment all of them want to be more activactive about the exploitation of asianAsian garment workers.
